headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 17 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 17 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 8 critical, 9 high, 8 medium, 14 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 14 other bases. 8 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and fog / freezing fog  — most notably around Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP). Network hotspots: Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) and 12 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, RVR limitations and very low visibility. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 17 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Gatwick (LGW/EGKK) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — CRIT: fog; snow; visibility down to 400 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk | Craiova (CRA/LRCV) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 200 m, RVR down to 550 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below alternate minima (current METAR) and 11 others. Worst affected now: Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 100 m, RVR down to 450 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, very low visibility) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) — CRIT: fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Modlin (WMI/EPMO) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, runway contamination / reduced braking) and 11 others. Changed since last run: Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY), Warsaw Chopin (WAW/EPWA), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Ljubljana Jože Pučnik (LJU/LJLJ) and 2 others.
